holidays.title: Air Force Reserve Birthday
holidays.description: Let us salute those who are constantly prepared to lead combat in air, space, and cyberspace.

holidays.title: Ambedkar Jayanti
holidays.description: Join us as we honor the life of the Father of India's constitution.

holidays.title: Americas Day
holidays.description: Americas Day celebrates the solidarity of American nations and strengthens their collaboration.

holidays.title: Cambodian New Year
holidays.description: On the second day of the Khmer New Year, people visit their relatives with gifts.

holidays.title: Children with Alopecia Day
holidays.description: “We change the emphasis from growing hair to growing confidence” — Jeff Woytovich.

holidays.title: Dreams of Reason Feast Day
holidays.description: Dreams of Reason Feast Day honors abandoned scientific theories and science fantasy futures.

holidays.title: Good Deeds Day
holidays.description: Be the positive change you want to see in the world on Good Deeds Day!

holidays.title: International Moment of Laughter Day
holidays.description: International Moment of Laughter Day is the perfect opportunity to laugh away your worries.

holidays.title: National Dolphin Day
holidays.description: Show some love to our favorite social mammals this National Dolphin Day!

holidays.title: National Donate a Book Day
holidays.description: Support your public library by donating a book to share the joy of reading.

holidays.title: National Gardening Day
holidays.description: Our gardens are a unique space, so get out there and make the most of them.

holidays.title: National Look Up at the Sky Day
holidays.description: When was the last time you stopped and looked up at the sky?

holidays.title: National Pecan Day
holidays.description: Bake a pie or enjoy butter pecan delight; confess your love for this quintessential American nut.

holidays.title: Pan American Day
holidays.description: We celebrate rich diversity this Pan American Day! Join us right here!

holidays.title: Pan American Day
holidays.description: Join us as we commemorate the founding of the International Union of American Republics.

holidays.title: Pathologists’ Assistants Day
holidays.description: We honor all P.As for their hard work and dedication this Pathologists’ Assistants Day.

holidays.title: Perfume Day
holidays.description: Shower, spritz your favorite perfume, and celebrate the day in style with us.

holidays.title: RAINN Day
holidays.description: RAINN Day is an annual outreach by the nation's largest anti-sexual violence organization.

holidays.title: Reach As High As You Can Day
holidays.description: This is your sign to dream big and reach as high as you can!

holidays.title: Tamil New Year
holidays.description: Visit a Tamil state and greet people this New Year by saying "Puthāaṇdu vāazhthugal!"

holidays.title: World Chagas Disease Day
holidays.description: Chagas disease, if left unchecked, can lead to severe cardiac and digestive alterations.

holidays.title: Da Brat’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Da Brat, the female rapper who paved the way in the hip-hop industry on her birthday today.

holidays.title: Heather Thomson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Heather Thomson lives a life worthy of a classic movie in New York.
